api_list.name: Articles
api_list.description: Fetches articles from one specific newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news175.p.rapidapi.com/articles/nytimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news175.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news175.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{newspaper_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news175.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
